thread.title: Sharon Bell
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Sharon Bell

author: Sharon Bell
title: Sharon Bell
text: Intrepid tours are good quality, their tour guides above average and the itinerary varied enough that I always come home excited for my next trip rather than exhausted from the last. They allow me to visit countries that as a single woman traveller I could never visit safely on my own.
